file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-21-01-05 - CONTROL MODULE ASSEMBLY - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CONTROL MODULE ASSEMBLY - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the test of the control module assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CONTROL MODULE ASSEMBLY - OP- ALL 33-21-01-700-801-A ERATIONAL TEST EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-21-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-21-01-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CONTROL MODULE ASSEMBLY - OPERATIONAL TEST A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the operational test of the control module assembly. (2) The control module assembly is a device that contains control circuits for the systems below: (a) Cabin Lighting System; (b) Emergency Lighting System; (c) Main Door System; (d) Passenger Address System. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-21-00-700-801-A/500 PASSENGER CABIN LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST READING AND ATTENDANT CALL LIGHTS (1) - OP- AMM TASK 33-25-00-700-801-A/500 ERATIONAL TEST AMM TASK 33-50-00-700-801-A/500 EMERGENCY LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL CHECK MAIN-DOOR ALTERNATIVE OPENING SYSTEM - OP- AMM TASK 52-12-00-700-801-A/500 ERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Test Procedure SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) To do the test of the control module assembly, do the operational tests below: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 33-21-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • Passenger Cabin Lights - Operational Test ( AMM TASK 33-21-00-700-801-A/ 500). • Reading and Attendant Call Lights - Operational Test ( AMM TASK 33-25-00-700-801-A/500). • Emergency Lights - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 33-50-00-700-801-A/500). • Main-Door Alternative Opening System - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 52-12-00-700-801-A/500).
